Uses of Class
items.TradeTypes

Packages that use TradeTypes
Package Description
islands
Contains all the islands and island-associated classes (like Route)
items
Contains all upgrades and item classes

  • Uses of TradeTypes in islands

    Methods in islands that return types with arguments of type TradeTypes
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.HashMap<TradeTypes,​java.lang.Float> Store.getDefaultPrices()
    Creates a pricing map of every type, initialized to 1 (base value)
    java.util.HashMap<TradeTypes,​java.lang.Float> Store.getItemPrices()  
    Constructor parameters in islands with type arguments of type TradeTypes
    Constructor Description
    Store​(java.lang.String shopName, java.util.HashMap<TradeTypes,​java.lang.Float> itemPrices)
    Creates a new island that values each trade type accordingly

    Methods in items that return TradeTypes
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TradeTypes TradeGood.getType()  
    static TradeTypes TradeTypes.valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
    Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
    static TradeTypes[] TradeTypes.values()
    Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

    Constructor Description
